study_info.abstract: SAPRIN Mental Health Data Prize 2024 contains comprehensive mental health data from SAPRIN Demographic Surveillance Sites including Agincourt, DIMAMO, and AHRI. Data includes harmonized mental health instruments, clinical assessments, health service utilization data, and health condition variables suitable for comparative mental health research across South African populations. Multiple datasets with harmonization-ready structure.
study_info.geog_coverage: SAPRIN network sites: Agincourt (Limpopo), DIMAMO (Limpopo), AHRI (KwaZulu-Natal)
study_info.analysis_unit: Individuals with mental health assessments and health condition tracking
study_info.data_kind: Cross-sectional and longitudinal mental health survey data with harmonized instruments (Zip format with data files)
study_info.universe: Residents of SAPRIN demographic surveillance sites aged 15+ with mental health and health condition assessments
